content: Now take one of the side paths to return to the large cave entrance, and look for a tunnel with some torches and a faint green light. The dark cave tunnel holds a green Wisp you can absorb to refill a bit of your Gourd, but beware, as the place is the perfect ambush spot.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The Fourth Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
Now take one of the side paths to return to the large cave entrance, and look for a tunnel with some torches and a faint green light. The dark cave tunnel holds a green Wisp you can absorb to refill a bit of your Gourd, but beware, as the place is the perfect ambush spot.
